item.title: Blogging with gh-pages and and Github Actions
item.author: bjarte@bjartek.org (Bjarte S. Karlsen)
item.description: In order to host my blog I looked no further then gh-pages. Since my sourcecode is on github and they offer free gh-pages and ci with github actions I see no reason why this simple blog should be hosted anywhere else.
